entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers this evening then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Flurries over higher terrain this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
